author: Lord Helmchen
name: Coop_2v8_plus_Script
description:
Accompanying script for the Map "Coop_2v8_plus_Script". Same functions like the "Crush_All_Buildings_On_AI_Loose" + a prio function for Stonecutters for Romans and Egyptians, for when they have no finished Stonecutter anymore. 
Keep the map specific items for an extra challenge, otherwise tick it off. updated @ 01.04.2024 21:20

author: Saibot
name: Default
description: Sword, Bow, Spear or Mana can be selected by the player, spawning it at the players Base. Players can battle themselves without building.

author: Fearles
name: Defend The Oasis
description: This is a scripted three-player map created by Fearles. Your objective is to defend the large tower in the middle for 90 minutes against waves of enemies swarming the green lands of the Oasis from all directions. Venture into the desert to claim additional resources spawning in three special locations around you. Be quick though, enemies will send patrols there, and goods disappear 5 minutes after you receive the message from your scouts. With each wave, the enemies will grow stronger. Occasionally, they might also use unconventional methods of aggression. Be ready for everything! (Updated @ 19.11.2023)

author: Lord Helmchen
name: Crush_All_Buildings_On_AI_Loose
description: It's main function is to crush the buildings of a player(AI) when it's defeated, as in its last tower has been captured. (Updated at 06.11.2023)

author: Saibot
name: Hunt_The_Pope
description: A Player looses if they dont have a priest after minute 35. Once they have a priest - BigTemples are crushed. (Updated at 17.12.2023)
